dublin_core.dcvalue: We previously reported effects on heat shock protein 70 HSP70 mRNA expression a cytoprotective protein induced under stressful condition in human trophoblast cells exposed to amplitude modulated Global System for Mobile Communication GSM signals In the present work the same experimental conditions were applied to the rat PC12 cells in order to assess the stress responses mediated by HSP70 and by the Mitogen Activated Protein Kinases MAPK in neuronal like cells an interesting model to study possible effects of mobile phone frequencies exposure
Effects of the exposure to intermittent 1.8 GHz radio frequency electromagnetic fields on HSP70 expression and MAPK signaling pathways in PC12 cells.
